name: df-cnext
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3
body: |- wceq(ccnext, cmpo(s0, s1, ctop, ctop, cmpt(s2, co(cuni(cv(s1)), cpm, cuni(cv(s0))), ciun(s3, cfv(cfv(ccl, cv(s0)), cdm(cv(s2))), cxp(csn(cv(s3)), cfv(co(cv(s1), cflf, co(cfv(cfv(cnei, cv(s0)), csn(cv(s3))), crest, cdm(cv(s2)))), cv(s2)))))))
comment: Define the continuous extension of a given function. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 1-Dec-2017.)
